title: Creativity-Based Mathematics Teacher Training: Mobile Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of mathematics curriculum content and understanding of basic teaching methodologies
context.additional_context: Formative assessment-centered course for pre-service professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, operated in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can utilize at least three creative thinking facilitation strategies during the mathematical problem-solving process
Learners can develop two or more instructional tools for designing learners' idea generation and evaluation processes
Learners can produce one piece of mathematics education content by applying collaborative brainstorming techniques in a mobile environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
